name: Baxton_Studio_Chara_Modern_and_Contemporary_Twin_Size_Fabric_Upholstered_Headboard_
reviews: I love the style of this headboard. We have twin beds in the guest room so we went ahead and got two. For the price, they are good quality and update the room without having to spend a fortune.
description: The beautiful curves of the Chara headboard will have you feeling like royalty each and every night.  With a nod to classic French design and available in a range of neutral tones, this collection is decadent and utterly divine.  The sweeping curves and lush upholstery of the Chara Collection reminds us of a candlelight dinner in Paris, both intimate and wonderfully over the top, all at once.  For those who seek to add a touch of luxury to their bedroom, the Chara headboard will almost instantly glam up any space with its silver nailheads trim, creating that French-inspired boudoir that you have been dreaming of.  Button-tufting design draws the attention of your guests right away!  Constructed of solid rubberwood frame and plywood, the headboard is built to last.  Soft polyester fabric in greyish beige or dark grey over the foam filled headboard provides ample comfort for you to lean against.  Leg supports are invisible once set up and can be adjusted to suit the height of your ensemble for convenience.  Headboard sits between the wall and the ensemble frame, attaching not to the bed base but to the legs, for stability.  Made in Malaysia, this Twin size headboard requires assembly.Modern and contemporary twin size upholstered headboardMaterials:  Solid rubberwood frame, plywood, foam and polyester fabricFabric color:  greyish-beige or dark greyCurvy shape with silver nailheads trim and button tufting for a classy and glamour lookThe headboard comes with 2 pre-drilled holes (with height from ground up of 5.5" and 8") that go with any Leggett and Platt bedframe The upper part on the back of the headboard's legs comes with 5 predrilled holes with 2.55" apart from one another for height adjustmentAssembled size (Inches) : Twin - 39.17"W X 25.99"H x 2.36" Thick; Legs: 0.79" X 1.77" X 38.98"; Each Pre-drilled hole is 2.52" apartAssembly requiredMade in MalaysiaStyleContemporary, ModernMaterialFoam, Polyester, RubberwoodFinishBeige Finish, Grey FinishBed StyleHeadboardsAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, GreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesAdjustable Height
